subject: Sex Crimes
Basketball
Libel and Slander
Decisions and Verdicts
lead_paragraph: Salacious claims about the wife of an assistant Syracuse coach who was fired after claims he molested boys have no bearing in a slander lawsuit, a judge ruled Friday.
snippet: Salacious claims about the wife of an assistant Syracuse coach who was fired after claims he molested boys have no bearing in a slander lawsuit, a judge ruled Friday.
